mapper.insert: insert into content(bno, name, address, phone, foodType, price, parking, salesTime, holiday, site, menu) values(c_seq.nextval, #{name}, #{address}, #{phone}, #{foodType}, #{price}, #{parking}, #{salesTime}, #{holiday}, #{site}, #{menu})
mapper.update: update content set name=#{name}, address=#{address}, phone=#{phone}, foodType=#{foodType}, price=#{price}, parking=#{parking}, salesTime=#{salesTime}, holiday=#{holiday}, site=#{site}, menu=#{menu}, regDate=sysdate where bno=#{bno}
mapper.insert: insert into review(rno, uno, bno, replygrade, reply, replydate, updatedate) values(seq_review.nextval(), #{uno}, #{bno}, #{replygrade}, #{reply}, #{replydate}, #{updatedate})
